title: Daily Meal Tracking with All Statuses
description: Verify that users can mark each of the 8 daily meals with statuses: pending (default), completed, skipped, and partial including adding and saving notes for each meal.

steps.description: Navigate to the Meals page
For each of the 8 meals, set status to completed and add a note
Verify that the meal status updates correctly to completed with the note saved
Change some meals to skipped and partial statuses with notes
Verify meal status changes are saved accurately including notes
Reload the page
Confirm persistence of meal status and notes

title: Dashboard Progress Ring Updates with Meal Status
description: Check that the progress ring on the Dashboard accurately reflects the number of completed meals out of 8 each day and updates in real time as meal statuses change.

steps.description: Navigate to the Meals page
Mark 5 meals as completed
Navigate to the Dashboard
Verify the progress ring shows 5/8 meals completed
Go back to Meals and complete remaining meals
Return to Dashboard
Verify progress ring updates to show 8/8 meals completed

title: Weekly Weight Logging with Optional Photo and Graph Update
description: Ensure users can add a weekly weight record, optionally attach a photo, add notes, and see the weight progress graph update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Weight page
Add a new weight record with weight value, photo attachment, and notes
Verify the new record is saved with correct weight, photo, and notes
Confirm the progress graph reflects the new weight entry
Verify the weight graph updates and shows trend properly

title: Weekly Meal Prep Checklist Completion and Reset
description: Verify the meal prep checklist with 9 predefined items can be marked completed on Sundays and resets correctly the next week.

steps.description: Navigate to Meal Prep page on a Sunday
Mark all 9 predefined items as completed
Check the meal prep record is saved with all items completed and timestamp
Simulate advance to next week
Verify the checklist resets to not completed for the new week

title: Daily Backpack Checklist Functionality and Reset
description: Confirm the daily backpack checklist items (sandwiches, fruits, nuts, yogurts, water, peanut butter) can be checked off each day and resets the following day.

steps.description: Navigate to Backpack page
Mark each item in the checklist as packed
Check that items are saved as packed for the current day
Simulate day change to next day
Verify checklist is reset with all items unchecked

title: Weekly Score Calculation Accuracy
description: Validate that the weekly scoring system calculates total score up to 100 points based on meals (50 pts), meal prep (20 pts), tracking consistency (15 pts), and weight progress (15 pts).

steps.description: Complete 56 meals in a week with various statuses
Complete all meal prep items for the week
Maintain daily meal tracking consistency
Log weekly weight progress within target gain
Navigate to Dashboard score section
Verify weekly score is correctly aggregated and does not exceed 100 points

title: Offline Functionality and Data Persistence
description: Test the app's offline capabilities including data persistence using IndexedDB and verify data availability and functionality without network connection.

steps.description: Use the app with network connected: add meals, weight records, checklist completions
Go offline by disabling network
Navigate through app sections and review previously saved data
Verify all previously entered data is available and UI responds properly
Add new meal status updates and checklist completions offline
Confirm data saves locally and reflects in UI

title: PWA Installability and Service Worker Caching
description: Ensure the app supports installation as a PWA on supported devices and service worker caching works for offline startup and asset availability.

steps.description: Access the app on supported mobile device or desktop
Trigger the PWA installation prompt and install the app
Verify the app installs successfully and launches from home screen
Go offline and launch the installed PWA
Confirm service worker caches assets and app loads correctly offline

title: Reports Weekly and Monthly Data Accuracy
description: Verify reports page displays aggregated meal completion counts, weight changes, and scoring summaries correctly for both weekly and monthly views.

steps.description: Complete meals and weight entries over several weeks
Navigate to Reports page
Check weekly report displays correct meal completion, weight change, and score data
Switch to monthly report view
Verify monthly aggregation of data is accurate and consistent

title: Historical Calendar View and Past Records Access
description: Confirm that the History calendar view shows past days, allows user to select a day, and access corresponding meal and weight records with trends correctly displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to History page
Select a previous day on the calendar
Verify selected day's meal statuses and weight records are displayed
Review trend data and charts for historical progress
Confirm trend charts show consistent historical data

title: User Settings Persistence and Effect
description: Validate that changes to user settings including goal weight, start date, and theme (light/dark/system) persist across sessions and take immediate effect.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings page
Modify goal weight, start date, and theme preference
Verify changes reflect immediately in app UI and underlying data
Reload or restart the app
Confirm settings persist after restart and UI reflects preferences

title: Error Handling on Invalid Weight Entry
description: Ensure the app prevents invalid weight inputs (e.g., negative numbers, non-numeric text) and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Weight page
Attempt to enter empty, negative, zero, or non-numeric weight values
Verify error message is shown and the invalid data is not saved

title: Meal Status Change from Completed Back to Pending
description: Verify that users can revert a meal's status from completed, skipped, or partial back to pending and that this updates all related UI elements accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Meals page
Mark a meal as completed
Change the meal status back to pending
Verify the status changes correctly and progress ring updates on Dashboard

title: App Navigation via Bottom Navigation Bar
description: Check that the bottom navigation bar items navigate correctly to: Dashboard, Meals, Weight, Reports, and Settings pages.

steps.description: Use bottom navigation bar to tap on each of the 5 main sections
Verify the app content updates to corresponding section for each tap

title: Visual Feedback and Responsiveness for Meal Actions
description: Ensure that when the user marks a meal status or adds notes, the UI provides immediate and clear visual feedback on mobile devices under varying screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the Meals page on different device sizes or emulators
Change meal statuses and add notes
Confirm that visual indicators update immediately and UI remains responsive without layout issues

title: Security: Local Data Storage Only Without External Transmission
description: Confirm that all user data is stored locally and no external network requests transmit personal meal, weight, or checklist data to remote servers.

steps.description: Perform all user operations like meal tracking, weight logging, checklist completion
Monitor network requests using developer tools
Verify no user data is sent to external servers or cloud
